name: BMI Imaging Systems
tag_list: scanning, imaging, data-key-entry, paper-conversion, film-conversion, record-conversion, content-management, document-management, records-management, document-hosting, digital-reel, emc, emc-applicationxtender, canon, russ-bassett, document-conversion--do
overview: BMI’s document management solutions enable organizations to electronically store, organize, and manage all kinds of information, and get instant, security-controlled access via Microsoft Windows and/or standard web browsers. Our solutions incorporate hardware and software from market-leading vendors such as EMC and Canon. BMI’s own Digital ReeL is a software application designed specifically for viewing microfilm, microfiche and aperture card digital images. Our Professional Services team can integrate your information with nearly any type of existing process and business application you currently may be using.
